name: Manifest Information Services
goal:
Manifest analyses the corporate governance and sustainability disclosures of quoted companies to support investor stewardship.
Provision of secure, electronic shareholder voting platform for institutional investors
Research and data projects for all parties interested in good governance
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
Manifest supports the rights of investors to be able to vote their shares quickly, securely and effectively on a cross border basis. We are therefore primarily interested in:
Shareholder Rights
Securities Law
Corporate Reporting
